Change is all around us... people leave, creating little holes in our hearts - whether they mean to, or not. Our Mel is flying off tomorrow afternoon. New start, new life. I'm going to miss her so much.. Can't sleep tonight. Too much to think about.
Happy birthday, buddy Nicky took this
It is now 11:11 - I once had a friend who wished on 11:11s every night, till she stopped believing in 11:11s
I tuned out all the voices in my class an hour ago. They're still droning on and on... but I am spinnnnnin' it up on FFR. Genius.

Trying desperately to weave the days into silk again, to regain all lost momentum. I came to school today with a different sort of bounce in my step! Tucked my shirt in, too. Look neat feel neat think neat yknw?
School today has drained me of all enthusiasm I had this morning. I honestly couldn't care less about how a bell actually rings, or about the light intensity of detectors.
Third day at school and it's beginning to kill me slowly. Not that I'm complaining about breaks almost every hour/cheese tofu/waffles... I feel quite out of place. What's new?
I am basically in much need of entertainment. With the exception of BSS, there is nothing to look forward to in the coming weeks.

Yesterday night was so sinful... 
Brilliant morning. Or afternoon, rather. I might wear a dress later.
Heard lupe's superstar? I love that track..

Dizzy. Nauseous too.. probably because of all that camomile tea with the excessive amount of maple syrup i added to it. I want to go to bed, but i'm still scared, so. 

Am drowsing myself in thrash it's like 1 5 6 3 8 9 3 2.. beat on beat off 3 4 5 6 2 4 5.. again and again. Tomorrow will find me happy. We've got a room at the ritz-carlton and that means fun all night. it seems like it's going to be pretty fun..

A certain someone once said that she was "starved of female companionship". In my opinion, she probably only had her loud, boastful, self-centered whiny self to blame. Not that she will ever realize it, though... but then again, females are a very dangerous sort. There are the cunning, sly ones. The downright bitchy ones. The ones whom you should pray you never cross, because they will make your life a living hell if they choose to... so sometimes it really might be better if you just stick to yourself and the few people you'd trust with everything you've got. I'm one of the luckier ones, i think? I have amazing friends. Do you have friends you love that much? Ones you'd do anything for? I hope you have one, at least... one isn't much, but that one person can be all you need, really.
Ok, breathe. You are a bubble, thin, pink. You are in the ocean. Drifting, drifting, drifting through the million different shades of blue, of green.

Considering how i fared, i should be wallowing in my little pool of self-loathing and regret. Bitter, bitter, very bitter.. but whatever. Never been academically-inclined(and never will be). It is nessa and raphael's birthday tomorrow. I like birthdays.. my brother's having a party at MacDonald's on saturday. I hope they'll give out a lot of french fries... just so i'll have something to do, to distract me from the annoying clown voices and screaming children which i will be fucking surrounded by for 2 whole hours. All of us are going out for nessa's birthday in the evening. We're going to have cake and ice cream. Not forgetting japanese wine *.* - that reminds me of fab, for some reason. He's adorable when he prances around the house making weird funny faces!!! and the special voice which he only uses on me he makes me want to eat him alive sometimes.

In 5 minutes i am going to grab my bag/phone/book, walk to the shoe cabinet and choose between the grey sandals and the black slippers. No walking into the kitchen in hopes of finding "something small" to eat. I have plenty of reason to be happy today... i'm only going to be working the lunch shift, we'll be meeting francis, leong and neek, then gwen and i will probably go over to fab's to bum around. I shall not, in any case, let the fact that in 29 hours my life will be Over, get to me...
Sooo. I hope suzy or whatever her name is calls back today. I really wouldn't mind extra cash...

Stop fighting please stop fighting i don't want us to fight anymore you have no idea how much it hurts, every single fucking time. In anger in frustration people do tend to lose control of themselves with their frazzled minds and spinning thoughts you make me feel like a fucking monster sometimes. I wish you'd remember that i'm still only human. Am i not allowed to be angry? Words, words, we hurl words that burn back and forth. You are like a hurricane you suck me in you bleed me fucking dry you have no idea how much control you have over me - my heart, my mind. We are like vultures we are like, lions silently circling each other the few moments before they throw themselves into a fierce fight stop please fucking stop it's killing me i am tired i feel so defeated i want to give up but there's no way that i can possibly do that because i have already given up so much to be with you. My pride my secrets my true inner fucking self, all because i love you. I love you with all i have the best i can every fucking day you make it seem as though you're blind to that very fact maybe it's because my best isn't good enough for you and if that's the case then i am sorry i am, sorry.. Forgive me please forgive me for i am completely at a loss now i don't know what to do you are my ocean, my web of lies of hope of sin of belief of trust my fucking future. Difficult so difficult we spit out bitter words we draw back we hold back we do everything but let go, you never do let me let things go you say i'm always running away, running away from problems but that is a part of me that has always been this way. I'm a fucking coward i cannot bear losing you but i am hopeless hopeless fucking hopeless i whisper apologies to you in the dark apologies that you think are results of my wanting to appease you because i am defeated i am my own army...

Nineteen days into the new year, now... I try not to let the more negative aspects of my somewhat drab life get to me. They weigh my tumbling emotions down a whole lot. I drift off into states of quiet thought randomly all through the hours that i am awake. 
I grow progressively tenser with each week that passes. With what, exactly, i am still not sure of. Still happy, but how happy is happy? No one is really Really happy all the time, anyway.

Has anyone tried earl grey tea? I love the way the light aftertaste lingers softly on your tongue.. The sky is a lovely shade of light purple tonight. Only because it's raining, of course. My windows are wide open... I hope the wind will carry me away. My stomach feels rather odd.. probably from all that sushi we had off the stupid conveyor belt this afternoon.

Wednesday night... 8.37PM! With a huge bowl of mushroom soup and apple juice. Fab and i went to New York New York for lunch yesterday.... I will never eat another bradwurst. The very thought of it sickens me now. You know the feeling you get when you eat way too much of something? Guess who's going to watch broken social scene in march?! Nessa got the three of us tickets this afternoon. Am thrilled. I think i shall attempt to burn off a bit of calories now before my legs refuse to move at all.

Sore eye. Ugly. Still don't see how it is possible to "Instill cream into conjunctival sac". Skipped work the past couple of days.... found another job at a french cafe. Lovely place.. Mich and I almost died today while walking across the sahara desert. We met fab/nick/mel/nessa after that and wasted $57, which could have bought us food and a lot of coffee... I wore spectacles out! My friends told me i looked "very clever"... no one ever tells me that. I think i should wear them out more. Or.. not. I still think i look like a prick in one. G3eK alert?

"Living in your head, without anything to numb you" I love songs with lyrics like these... songs that cut. Songs that make your skin prick. Songs that set you slightly more apart from everyone else. You know how on some days you just want to stay home, though you have a million other things to do? You get dressed, toss your make-up/wallet/mp3/water bottle into the same bag that you carried the day before(and the day before, and the week before that day, and the entire month before that week), take another fifteen minutes looking for something else to wear, till you're finally out and waiting for the bus when you close your eyes, sigh and walk back home? The things you have to do, the people you have to meet, they can wait. Do you have a new year's resolution? I do, but it really is kind of strange, for a.. resolution. It is: not be so nice anymore. I am tired of the attitudes(or lack of) of certain people around me and like gwen said, Maybe things will be different this time. Pretty words make things seem better for a little while, but that's just what they are. Pretty Words. Broken social scene @ mosaic this year!! I'd die to go...

While gwen and I were on our break today, we decided that we didn't feel like going back to work the second shift. Sat down for 20 minutes trying to come up with excuses to not go, till fab went like "say you fell into the river".. sounded stupid the first few seconds. Not so stupid the next few seconds and we was all for it the next minute. I knowwww... "fell into the river!!!" is just about the most ridiculous excuse.
Which was exactly what we did. 6 bottles of water later, we were soaking wet from head to toe. Soggy-everything. So... we then trooped back to the restaurant, only to see lionel(and friends)standing there, staring at us like we were crazy. Smudged make-up, and everything... very embarassing, but whatever. The stupid people who work there bought our pissed-off-cold-and-very-upset cover and we got let off for the evening. I called in sick a couple of hours after while we were at starbucks.
Of course i got let off tomorrow, as well. No work 4 me

Tomorrow supposedly marks a beginning of sorts.... almost everybody will be counting down till midnight in 7 hours. Somewhere, someone will be rushing to be with his fiance after a late shift at work. He will stop to buy her roses, white roses. He will smile at the old lady who gives him his change, pockets it and runs across the street. 11.58, just two more minutes. Almost there... he sees her now. Her face softens, her lips curve into a smile. 11.59, almost there, almost there. "Sorry i'm la-" he never makes it across that road. His body is thrown onto the sidewalk, twisted, soaking in a dark pool of blood. Her screams will be lost in the sound of fireworks that explode in the sky, among the Happy-new-years as she runs to him. She will kneel down, holding him to her, choking on her tears. She will have lost the one thing closest to her heart and he will have died in her arms. At 11.59 somewhere, an 18-year old girl will be sitting on her window ledge, looking up at the sky. She would have just swallowed all the pills that were left in the bottle. No more pain, because it will all end in a little while for her. She looks back at the room she's lived in all her life, the pictures hanging on her wall, the stash of CDs on her bed, her make-up on the dresser.. she will not need them anymore. Someone, somewhere, will be spending his last new year's eve with his family. He only has a month left to live, but it isn't enough...... it never is, is it? So much has happened this year. Both good and bad.. things that have made me cry, things that i want to just leave behind and move on. But i won't, because we should always take a part of everything that has happened to us everywhere we go. It is what makes us that one, special person that we are to everyone else. There is a certain.... balance, of everything. Bad things happen, so you can fix it - or learn to. You meet people along the way, people that try to bring you down, people that make your life that much more miserable. Or you meet angels. Angels that stay for a little while, that make you feel like you are actually worth something. You may be lonely for the most part of your life. Friends, you have those, but there is still a gap in your soul. A gap that yearns to be filled, but never will be, and you know it. You are never fully contented. You want more. That is partly why you carry on living, though it hurts every single day. It hurts in little ways that you don't really notice, because you've grown too used to it that you don't even see it anymore. I will be with the people i love tonight. We're not going to be doing much, but that's not really so important, is it? A lot has changed.... Are you going to be up to anything tonight? If you're going to be alone, that's okay, too. You could stay up listening to your favorite song on repeat, with a glass of milk and a peanut butter sandwich. You could try to make a list of things that mean the most to you. Things you want to keep constant, things you want to change. You can make a phone call to that one person whom you haven't spoken to in quite awhile, or lose yourself in a book. .. Or you can tell yourself it is just another day. You can go to bed at 11, then wake up tomorrow morning and spend the whole day in front of the television with cereal and juice. Whatever it is you are going to do, i hope that you'll find some sort of contentment. Even if it isn't much. To the new year xo (with butterfly kisses and a messy hug)

It has been a brilliant saturday so far. Fab picked gny and I up from work, then we went to have stingray with nessa. I hate the whole idea of CPF, by the way.... I earned a total of $922.50 this month but a quarter of that sum was taken away from me. P.S. My bed broke yesterday(I sleep on the floor now)

One of my best friends has left and he's only coming back next month... The fool. I miss him already(melissa probably misses him More Already), plus I forgot to say bye. My christmas was rotten. I even got grounded on christmas day, and forced to leave a movie early. I tell myself it's alright though. Tears go away.... it is now 3 in the morning! I wonder if my friends are asleep yet. I can imagine mich lying in bed with her pretty bangs kissing her forehead, nessa watching Friends on her laptop, mel sitting in between her brother and sister(to keep them from fighting)on the plane(ON HER WAY BACK HOME!).

Gabriel has come home, bringing me the loveliest things from california, and I don't have to go to work till friday. I will be stuck in the company of hitler and the nazi party instead. Which is exactly why i am not looking forward to christmas. Not feeling it. I've got presents for a couple of people though.. 
Gwen and i shall be busy baking tomorrow afternoon. I cannot wait to see Chow Chow. He's a fuzzly bear.  
I hope you have a lovely christmas, reader. I have a feeling that I shall be a little more sad this year. It feels like I have, in a way, lost a friend. One who used to be closest to my heart. Her pretty words and pretense that nothing has happened between us just to keep it going isn't helping much. But then again, will is a very strong thing. Are you strong enough?
Merry Christmas everybody.... With love.

Almost 2 in the morning. I am sitting here with vegetables and soya sauce. My chéri is going away for two days.... Gwen and i are going to do something to our hair tomorrow. The very thought makes me feel a little better. I like doing things to my hair. I like cutting hair, as well.... we did janice's and nessa's hair not too long ago. They both have bangs now...


See?

As gwen puts it, work has now become Life. 9 days to christmas. I still haven't really gotten into the whole feel of it. The other night at nessa's we played christmas songs on repeat, then we sang along for awhile. Then, then we fell asleep.
So... things have been quite rocky, the past week. I'd love to tell you that everything is alright now, but no, not really. There's still the empty calm that drives me crazy sometimes.
"I’m a headcase if I don’t keep moving
And my head hurts if I don’t sit still
It’s an itch that I’ll never stop scratching
It’s a hole that I’ll never quite fill"

How apt. Love EP.

It ripples through me. Gently, violently..... mostly in-between. Every single day. It will never stop. What do we do now? What do.... I do? Your words cut. I don't know, I don't know if I should believe you. Don't come too close, now. It hurts and we need to breathe a little. I have enough to deal with, as it is... I am tired. Tired of trying, of knowing. Tired of how familiar frustration has become to me. I am going to push everything out of my mind. Leave me alone.

I was rudely awakened an hour ago. Have been sitting here in front of the computer ever since with breakfast(which i cannot finish). Gab is in L.A., now. I hope he takes lovely pictures.... Nessa hasn't replied my text yet, so i hope she does before 11. Which probably will not happen, since normal people only wake after 1. So yesterday at work, my manager made me wear reindeer antlers(with bells on them)on my head. In the whole spirit of christmas? Gwen didn't get it so bad, though. She had to wear the red hat....this thing with a bob at the back. We still looked like idiots. We have to wear them all the way till christmas. Which is in about two weeks. I am going to meet gwen by the river in ten minutes. With a tummy and a stubborn heart.
My thoughts, they race through my head like rockets. Rockets through me

Instant noodles again. I can already feel it passing through me, weighing me down. It doesn't help that I had two doughnuts either. Cream-filled. Sinful...
Gabriel and i sat by the river this morning. He's gone now. Australia. For two whole weeks. I wish i could go away, as well.
I have been obsessed with green tea lately, by the way. We get a free flow of it at work. We also get free food.

Hello, reader... my eyelids feel heavier than usual today. My fingers, almost trance-like as they move across the keyboard. I stopped feeling hungry three hours ago.
So..... work. At the animal farm. Gwen and I have to pull full sentences together in mandarin there because no one understands us when we speak to them in english.
Do you like empty car parks? You walk up, up, up to the highest level. Up, past the dull red car, past the lonely bike parked in the far corner, past the ugly silver railings. Up, where there is no roof. Up where the sky hovers above, where the wide expanse of dark blue threatens to suck you in. Up where the rain lightly caresses you. Up where the birds and the wind and the spirits come to play.... do you like empty car parks as much as i do?

I was doing the lunch shift on saturday when the chef stationed behind me told me that i was a Watermelon. Which, obviously, left me quite disturbed for the next few minutes. I would much rather have been called something nicer, such as.... I don't know, a blueberry, or something. Eri-san hired gwen as well, so she's going to be working with me now... I shall no longer be the Odd New (and very lonely) Part-timer. My friends are all leaving..they will come back in time, of course, but still. I'll miss them. Melanie, kc, gabriel.. Phuket was beautiful. I have a lot of pictures, but that can wait. As gab so aptly put it, my life is "getting more filled up". It isn't quite a good thing, actually. I really would prefer to just bum around everyday without having to go to work or anything. It's a cold, cunning world out there... always changing. Nothing stops, nothing waits for you. People slip in and out of your life without you noticing.

Two days ago, I fell out of the 'Jobless' category. I start work next friday. I will be forced to don the hideous dull gray company uniform and exercise my social skills. Neek came over yesterday and we spent quite some time fretting over the sudden loss of volume from the speakers, only to find that the main volume control was switched to Mute a few hours after. Actually... I'm not too sure about the 'we'. Knowing neek, she might have been the one who decided to switch it to Mute as an idea of a joke. Have i mentioned how silly that girl is? :) I shall be flying off in a couple of hours... Got to go find my travel-handy-toothbrush set that I KNOW I left somewhere around here...

I spent most of the past week with fab, mich, mel and caroline :) On a separate note, Lionel is going away to india for a whole year. I was there for about four days three years back. Four days, and i almost died. Ana and i felt like room service one night, so we decided on 'Drums of Heaven', which was supposed to be chicken drumsticks. Really good ones, considering how they added in 'Heaven'...... Not. Think soggy vegetables stuffed in a badly molded floury dough of sorts. I never knew food from heaven tasted so awful.... must have missed the memo.

I had sushi with mich and caroline today. 'Sushi drowned in soy sauce'. Remember how i said that love is a vicious cycle? I take that back. Nothing can get any worse than friendship. Friends are supposedly likened to angels, sent to you to make sure that you are never....completely alone in this cold, bitter world that we all live in. So what happens when you hurt a friend?

To sleep and forget. I do that, a lot... which really is becoming quite a bad habit. I push my emotions aside so easily, that when i actually want to Feel Something at some point, my mind only registers a general.... emptiness, a numbness of sorts? To want to feel. Am i the only one who craves that...?

We were snipping bits of each other's hair off around 3AM last night at mel's. Mich and i have bangs, now... she looks very lovely. Was at the airport at quite an ungodly hour this morning to send gwen off.
Easy, how I fly... In the sea, like in the sky

The jealous mind tortures you, spins you madly around in the dark. You don't want to show her how unhappy you are. It will just lead to the start of something else, something quite empty.. you don't want to go there. She's almost all you have, and you love her. You need her. Like how you always have.. Her words send hurt racing down your chest, your back. Racing through your head. Stop. It really is quite enough, you just want things to fall back into place again. Jealousy plays with you still..
I have a chemistry paper in 6 hours. A chemistry paper that I didn't study much for because, well... I thought I was supposed to take Physics, which I studied for almost the whole day yesterday..
H8 THE SUN the dark rings around my eyes obviously aren't making me feel any better... how am I supposed to get any form of beauty sleep when I can't even get to the part where i'm supposed to Sleep?
